thread.title: A second time user booking with Amoma
thread.title_full: AMOMA.com bewertet von A second time user booking with Amoma

author: A second time user booking with Amoma
title: A second time user booking with Amoma
text: The experience with Amoma was great and easy. The price was also great. The hotel i selected was great location, great service and really friendly but the bed was awful. I know if i see Amoma's name i can trust it will be great.
